meanings.definition: Sheets used on a bed for covering and sleeping.
meanings.sent1: I love the soft bedsheets on my bed.
meanings.sent2: After a long day, I look forward to snuggling under my cozy bedsheets.
meanings.sent3: When the cat mistook the bedsheets for a hiding spot, it made for a funny scene.
meanings.sent4: The bedsheets were like a fluffy cloud embracing me as I drifted off to sleep.
meanings.sent5: The floral pattern on the bedsheets added a touch of elegance to the room.

meanings.definition: The act of putting sheets on a bed.
meanings.sent1: I find changing the bedsheets to be a calming routine.
meanings.sent2: Properly folding the bedsheets after washing them keeps them neat.
meanings.sent3: Trying to fold fitted bedsheets can sometimes feel like solving a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her expertise in arranging bedsheets made the bed look like a hotel room.
meanings.sent5: The bedsheets slipped from my grasp as I tried to tuck them in, causing a moment of frustration.
